verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yugasamaptiki aagamanamunaku Suchanalenno choodumuraa Vedanalenno meediki vachchuraa Kalavaramondaka kanipettumura{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Indlanu gattuchu pendliki ichchuhu Naarunu naatuchu traaguchu tinuchu Jagamulo janulu digulu lenappudu Dongavale ila doravai vachura{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aa dinamainanu aa gadiyainanu Paramuna dootalu dharanilo manujulu Yevarunugaani erugane erugaru Melakuvatho Yesu pilupunu vinuchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aa dinamula sharma anthamu kaagaa Suryuni chandruni chikati kammu Akasamandali shaktulu kadalunu Mahimato Yesu immahidiguraa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Arbaatamutho aashcharyamutho Devuni bhoorato mana prabhu digura Kristu nandunna mrutulaguvaaru Ekamuga prabhu Yesuni jera{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yetuchuchina neekatu kanipinchunu Kondala bandala nundinanu Kodama simhamai kopagniyai Yeduruga vachina kadalaga levura{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Eththabaduta kayathamaa neevu Tarunamu idiyethadavu cheyakura Rakshanalo nireekshana kaligi Rakshaku desuni rajyamu chera{/lang-eng}
